description:
Although Hozuki has successfully driven off Cicinho and his crew, the Ferrari family`s relief is short-lived as the police suddenly draw their weapons and escort the family off to a holding cell. The only one to avoid detention, Hozuki runs in to a Galileo fanatic named Anna. After Anna tells her the truth behind the chain of events, Hozuki decides she needs to save her family.
Source: crunchyroll
